name: Emailio
headline: Email built for wellness
generated_description:
Emailio is on a mission to revolutionize how we think about email by making it a tool for wellness. Imagine an email system that promotes productivity while simultaneously caring for your mental and emotional well-being. That's what Emailio aims to accomplish.

Initially, Emailio started as a small website, but it quickly made its mark in the startup ecosystem by joining the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W14. Although specific founding details aren't provided, their involvement with Y Combinator signals a strong foundation in the startup world.

Located at [emailio.com](http://emailio.com), they have a tight-knit team of about five employees. While the location isn't mentioned, their small team suggests a focused and agile approach to developing their product.

Emailio is tagged with keywords like “productivity” and “health & wellness,” which encapsulate their dual focus. They seem to be carving out a niche where email doesn’t just serve as a communication tool but as a catalyst for better mental health and productivity.

Currently, specifics on their operations and offerings aren't disclosed, but given their mission and background, they are likely working on innovative features or services that align with enhancing wellness through email. If you're interested in a more balanced approach to handling your inbox, Emailio is definitely a company to keep an eye on.
